dict.string: This app needs access to your photo library to select and upload images for products, invoices, and profile pictures.
This app needs access to your Desktop folder to save and load inventory files, backups, and exported reports.
This app needs access to your Documents folder to save invoices, reports, backups, and other inventory-related files.
This app needs access to your Downloads folder to save exported PDF invoices, Excel reports, and backup files.
This app needs access to removable volumes to save backups and export data to external drives.
This app needs file access to manage your inventory database, images, and documents.
